entry.title: Monday night: Showers. Low plus 3.
entry.summary: Showers. Risk of thundershowers early this evening. Fog patches developing this evening. Amount 5 mm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 20 this evening. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Monday 16 May 2016

entry.title: Tuesday: Showers. High 7.
entry.summary: Showers ending in the morning then mainly cloudy. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High 7. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Monday 16 May 2016
